briefdescription.para: Allow all message keys (no category/library filtering).
Add a message key to the allowed key set.
Flush the current output stream buffer.
Get the currently configured message level threshold.
Restrict messages to a defined key set.
Lock the message handler for thread-safe operations.
Stream an item into the current message.

parameterdescription.para: Any type that supports output streaming via operator<<.
The item to insert into the message stream.

simplesect.para: Reference to the MHO_Message instance for chaining.

briefdescription.para: Remove all message keys (disables all filtering).
Remove a message key from the allowed key set.
Begin a new message with a specific level and key.

parameterdescription.para: The message key to associate with this message.

simplesect.para: Reference to the MHO_Message instance for streaming content.

briefdescription.para: Set the message level using a legacy integer interface.

parameterdescription.para: legacy integer representation of message level (lower is more verbose, min: -2, max: 5).

briefdescription.para: Set the allowed message level threshold.

parameterdescription.para: The new minimum message level to accept.

briefdescription.para: Access the singleton instance of the message handler.

simplesect.para: Reference to the singleton MHO_Message instance.

briefdescription.para: uses the singleton pattern (as we only have one terminal)

detaileddescription.para: class for managing messages to stdout
